name: Bully
description: Bully is the Kaspa Bull meme coin on KRC-20 network, it has been inspired by "bull" meme coins who lead the whole bull run, same thing will Bully do with Kaspa KRC20 ecosystem. Unlike other dogs, cats, frogs coin, Bully is the only unique Bull coin in kaspa KRC20 ecosystem which makes it very attractive and popular for newcomers. Project goal is to build Community engagement, cultivate a vibrant, active and enjoyable community. With the best ticker and memes out there in whole KRC20 network we are destined for growth and adoption, along with our humor awesome community.
